official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to increasing the number of health professionals who practice in the United States in a field of primary health care.
short_title: Health Professions Education Availability Act of 1993

summary.text: Health Professions Education Availability Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants under the program for health care for rural areas to health professions schools that emphasize training and encourage study in primary health care. Requires such schools to admit applicants who are not citizens or permanent residents only if no qualified citizens seek admission.

titles.title: Health Professions Education Availability Act of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to increasing the number of health professionals who practice in the United States in a field of primary health care.
